reviews.text: I have been coming here for lunch and coffee for 2  years. Beauty all around. The food was always good. Outside has a different menu than inside. For full meal it's seating inside. Makiato is 130 lek. Pizza ranges from 550 to 1000 lek.

The staff was very kind and the hospitality was on top. The food was very delicious. The traditional food which I recommend was the best. Also the meat dishes were fresh and good quality. ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©

The decor is the highlight of this restaurant. I absolutely love that this place is filled with Albanian artifacts and elements of traditional Albanian homes. The location in the park makes Juvenilja Castle a perfect escape from the busy city and the best part is that itâ€™s close to the major neighborhoods in Tirana.

The food was delicious and the service was fast. Perhaps the waiters were not very cheerful and energetic but they did the job right. I highly recommend trying this restaurant at least once, but please make sure to avoid visiting during hectic days like on the weekend, if you prefer a quiet place and fast service.

I love this place! The food and the ambiance is really good! I would highly recommend the place for a weekend lunch or dinner! One thing i would recommend to the Staff is to be a bit careful with the service! I think the service could use a bit of improvement because we had an unpleasant situation the last time. However that even would not shade our experience. Would recommend it!

The food was good but not wow. Normal food that you can eat anywhere. The service was not Profesional at all. The food was served so late and there wasn't justifiable because in total there was 3 tables occupied. One dish never came but present in the bill. When we ordered the dessert(not delicious like i was expecting) the waitress gives a look to the watch meaning: is late for the dessert. At the and the price was not worth what we received. I will go back probably only for coffee. Nothing else. So disappointed.
